channel.title: Questions Questions and more questions
channel.description:
1) Why wont it let me use mage or range in my server-everytime i try it uses combat 2)how do i give my monsters hitpoints, everytime i make a new 1, it has 0 hp 3)how do i access other peoples servers, everytime i try it says -error
thats all for now

item.title: Questions Questions and more questions
item.dc:creator: @Fluxedaway Fluxedaway
item.description:
@Fluxedaway wrote:

Download a source server, check the files and look for runserver.cfg, then open moparscape client and click start server and finally as ip type localhost or 127.0.0.0 or simply empty, also i suggest you try not to post each minute since its spam, hope that helps:).

For hamachi go to hamachi website, hamachi is a file that lets you connect to a server trough a network that without hamachi you wouldn’t be able to access (it’s used for people with routers and can’t get people to connect to their ip mostly).

Read full topic

item.title: Questions Questions and more questions
item.dc:creator: @mommaz_mage mommaz mage
item.description:
@mommaz_mage wrote:

ty
[br][size=1]Posted on: February 05, 2007, 08:15:43 PM[/size][hr]how can i chang it from hybrid scape?[br][size=1]Posted on: February 05, 2007, 08:16:15 PM[/size][hr]how can i change it so it isnt a hybrid server[br][size=1]Posted on: February 05, 2007, 08:18:42 PM[/size][hr]and about this himachi thing, wat does it do and where can i get it

Read full topic

item.title: Questions Questions and more questions
item.dc:creator: @Fluxedaway Fluxedaway
item.description:
@Fluxedaway wrote:

  1. Tell me if its hybridscape server, if so, you cant range and i dont know about mage since my hybrid screwed up;
    2)Did you ::npc them? You need to change their health on the server npc.java file;
    3)Check if server is online if it isn’t try another one if that doesnt work restart your client.

Hope that helped

Read full topic
